titleStmt.title: An ordinary lecture. Preached at the Blacke-Friers, by M. Egerton. And taken as it was vttered by characterie. Macte: officium, officii, fructus
titleStmt.author: Egerton, Stephen, 1555?-1621?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Windet for Iohn Dalderne, and are to be sold in Canon lane at the signe of the white horse,

notesStmt.note: "To the Christian reader" signed: Stephen Egerton.
Running title reads: A godly sermon.
"The earliest shorthand report that we possess in any modern language"--Folger Shakespeare Library Catalogue.
Signatures: A-B (B8, final leaf, is blank).
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: Canon lane at the signe of the white horse
